title: 急！！服务器权限问题
author: fafalnq
txt_content:
我在加了半砖商店插件  ，然后我输入的权限是这样的

Player:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - scs.use
    - scs.create.buy
    - scs.create.sell
    - scs.remove


然后他显示了一段红字




未命名.jpg (3.56 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2013-1-20 11:55 上传

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
看来... 确实是插件问题了，等更新吧。

如果急用商店，可以先用quickshop应急

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2013-1-20 12:07 编辑 

求文本完整内容

[code]  复制代码[/code]


啊。。。。。目测插件问题

replies.author: fafalnq
replies.txt_content:
wolski 发表于 2013-1-19 23:05 
求文本完整内容

[/code]# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Player:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - scs.use
    - scs.create.buy
    - scs.create.sell
    - scs.remove
    - residence.create

replies.txt_content: 你用的是PEx吧？不是默认组的名称是Default吗。。。这样改的话之前的玩家你最好重新加一遍组。。。
